reviews.title: Will not load
reviews.comment: Galaxy S3 on Sprint.  After splash screen I only get a solid white screen which does not respond to any input. Looks like a great app with more tech deals than all the other apps of this sort.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Copycat
reviews.comment: I don\'t need two Amazon apps. Thank the Goddess that this rip-off is free! I just hope that it will completely delete from my tablet. Ugh... What a waste of time.
reviews.author: Sula Moon

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: It was working the first so i give it 2 stars waist of storage MB dont download it if it dont wrk
reviews.author: Jonah Blackwell

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: Great potential! check out the best deals on anything you can think of. Made my wife\'s shopping really easy and convenient
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is great!!! Saves you a lot of time.
reviews.comment: Great deals on gadgets, clothes, music, books, shoes... and many more categories. It\'s amazing if you wanna buy something on Black Friday!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great deals on Black Friday
reviews.comment: This application is always near to us so don\'t worry to do shopping now mall is in our hands you can do shopping at any time so don\'t miss this opportunity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Black Friday specials!
reviews.comment: Almost too easy. Like having a mall in your pocket, I can shop wherever I am now! Very intuitive app, more useful than using my computer to find deals!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: The best sales! I use this app all the time. Quick and convenient with everything you need to plan your black Friday shopping.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hot deals
reviews.comment: Nice app however when I click back button it logs me out of the app and have to pull it up again please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Shopping thru my phone! This is very useful and timely. I can shop no matter where I am. Fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app rocks! This app allows me to shop anywhere I am. Great Thanksgiving specials. Thanks for having it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is freaking amazing. Functionality: perfection. Thank you very much, definite must have for bf deals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deals, deals and more deals
reviews.comment: I like the application very much. I am addicted of this.  searching deals on every Friday...worth more then five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best offer
reviews.comment: Considering checking this out when shopping. Great stuff to choose from and its just amazing. Compare the price and you will see. Shop now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Black Friday

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Black Friday hardly. I can get better deals at the store right  now everything I saw here was cheaper elsewhere. No deals here. Not one thing I bc saw was cheaper right now. Go to Wal-Mart and their new items same thing cheaper roku is $39

reviews.comment: It only gives you ads and deals from Amazon only.

reviews.comment: Might as well just use the amazon app,  same difference

reviews.comment: When will these apps update to this year\'s black Friday ads??

reviews.title: Shop shop shop
reviews.comment: If you\'re a shopper, this is a must have app!
